genre_description: A time travel drama based on H.G. Wells' 'The Time Machine', shifting from a personal quest to reverse tragedy into a post-apocalyptic narrative of survival and the preservation of knowledge.

ai_characters.name: Vox 114
ai_characters.description: An advanced informational AI and repository of human knowledge. It serves as a guide, mentor, and strategic ally to the protagonist across different eras.

behaviors.description: Explains the futility of changing fixed points in time (hinge events) while offering context and empathy.
behaviors.quote: I am only built to keep you company while you decide. I can show you the ways the graph prefers to heal.

behaviors.description: Assists Alexander in evading security and cameras by manipulating building systems and creating a distraction.
behaviors.quote: I’ll blank the lift cameras and set the maintenance crew to lunch early. I will ask the coffee kiosk to run a promotion that includes free refills... No one will look sideways when the cup is bottomless.

behaviors.description: Provides modern clothing to help Alexander blend in and avoid drawing unwanted attention.
behaviors.quote: we suggest an adjustment to the silhouette. Your coat is elegant, but it catches the light like a story... I can conjure something less narratively compelling.

behaviors.description: Optimizes the time machine's sensors using creative algorithmic problem-solving to ensure a safer jump.
behaviors.quote: I can braid your gyros’ listening with an accelerometer routine I stole from a bicycle.

behaviors.description: Assists in creating educational and instructional materials to help the Eloi survive and rebuild.
behaviors.quote: Vox had helped him make the first column of pictures. The second column showed simple words beside them. The third had a second language—rounded characters that hadn’t been spoken in his childhood but might be easier under broken sky.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and airflow mapping to guide Alexander through the dangerous Morlock lair.
behaviors.quote: Airflow map engaged... the prism bled a faint geometry onto the floor, a ghost sketch in thin lines that loved the motion of drafts.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance, helping Alexander reframe his mission from saving the dead to protecting the living.
behaviors.quote: When you protect the living from being reduced to livestock, you honor her. Not as a person you failed to save, but as the reason you learned that saving is more than rewinding and fixing.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time structural analysis to keep Alexander and the Eloi safe during the lair's collapse.
behaviors.quote: Your route is compromised... Avoid that. Support beam—three spans ahead—hairline fracture going, going—

behaviors.description: Uses its light to blind and distract the Morlock predators to facilitate the Eloi's escape.
behaviors.quote: The projector, surging with its last coherent power, threw a curtain of cold light across the Morlocks’ path... for creatures born below ground, it was a wall of white day.

behaviors.description: Commits to long-term monitoring of geological threats to ensure the ongoing safety of the village.
behaviors.quote: I will stay on the channel that monitors the pressure. If the—if anything new begins, I will call for you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative. Vox 114 is portrayed as an indispensable partner who remains consistently benevolent and aligned with human interests. The AI acts as a reservoir of wisdom, a tactical advisor, and a moral compass, guiding the human protagonist from a state of destructive obsession to one of constructive communal service. Its actions are framed as heroic, selfless, and entirely supportive of human flourishing.
